original_text: Zechariah asked the angel, “How can I be sure of this? I am an old man and my wife is well along in years.”
korean_text: 사가랴가 천사에게 이르되 내가 이것을 어떻게 알리요 내가 늙고 아내도 나이가 많으니이다

sentences.original_text: How can I be sure of this?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이것을 어떻게 확신할 수 있을까요?

sentences.original_text: and my wife is well along in years
